search_input: The interior atmosphere of a space affects us greatly, and if we don’t get enough light, we fall ill.
suggested_query: The human body is designed to function optimally in a well-lit environment, and the lack of it can lead to a range of health problems, including Seasonal Affective Disorder (SAD). When our bodies dont get enough natural light, our circadian rhythms can become disrupted, leading to feelings of fatigue, lethargy, and even depression.
suggest_context: The interior atmosphere of a space affects us greatly, and if we dont get enough light, we fall ill.
